metadata.title: CVE-2022-1471 SnakeYaml: Constructor Deserialization Remote Code Execution (important)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: The MITRE CVE dictionary describes this issue as: SnakeYaml's Constructor() class does not restrict types which can be instantiated during deserialization. Deserializing yaml content provided by an attacker can lead to remote code execution. We recommend using SnakeYaml's SafeConsturctor when parsing untrusted content to restrict deserialization.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 is installed
jenkins-2-plugins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
